H0.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. Taiwan

H1.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. Mongolia

H2.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. Korea

H3.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. 中国

A4.text: In Taiwan, Han Chinese (including both the earlier Han Taiwanese settlers and the recent Chinese that arrived in Taiwan with Chiang Kai-shek in 1949) constitute over 95% of the population.

A5.text: The Han Chinese represent 91.11% of the population in China.

A6.text: Ethnic minorities constitute 8.49% of China's population in 2010.
